CARE, COMPOSITON AND BARCODE INSIDE LABE.Remarks: Always two independent labels sewn together: BABY-CC + BABY-NAMING. There is a different quality label for those garments that undergo complex processes that may alter or erase the text on these labels. Please ask the buyer.
